Package model

Class Deck

java.lang.Object
java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
java.util.AbstractList<E>
java.util.Vector<E>
java.util.Stack<Card>
model.Deck
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Iterable<Card>, Collection<Card>, List<Card>, RandomAccess
public class Deck extends Stack<Card>
Represents a deck of playing cards. This class extends the `Stack` class and uses the `Card` class as its type parameter. It therefore has all the methods and characteristics of a `Stack`, but is specifically intended to hold and manage a collection of `Card` objects.
Author:
Simone
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Deck

      public Deck()
      Constructs a new deck of cards. This constructor initializes the `deck` field with a new deck of cards and shuffles the cards.

  • Method Details

    • replaceDeck

      public void replaceDeck(Stack<Card> discardedDeck)
      Replaces the current deck of cards with a new deck. The new deck is created by shuffling the discarded cards.
      Parameters:
      discardedDeck - a stack of cards that have been discarded and will be used to create the new deck

    • getCard

      public Card getCard(Game.Flipped flipped, Discarded discard)
      Gets a card from the deck. If the deck is empty, the deck is refilled with the discarded cards.
      Parameters:
      flipped - an object representing the flipped cards
      discard - an object representing the discarded cards
      Returns:
      a card from the deck

    • refillDeck

      public void refillDeck(List<Card> discarded)
      Refills the deck with the discarded cards.
      Parameters:
      discarded - a list of cards that have been discarded and will be added to the deck

    • getCards

      public ArrayList<Card> getCards(int nCards, Game.Flipped covered)
      Gets a specified number of cards from the deck.
      Parameters:
      nCards - the number of cards to get from the deck
      covered - a Flipped enumeration indicating whether the cards should be covered or not
      Returns:
      a list of cards that were drawn from the deck
